critique: The document is a formal executive order regarding the line of succession in the Department of Agriculture. The tone is formal and bureaucratic. The primary goal is to ensure the continuity of leadership in the event of the absence or incapacity of the Secretary and Under Secretary. There is no intention to elicit strong emotions. The order is purely administrative. Initial scores: Joy: 1, Sadness: 1, Anger: 1, Fear: 1, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 1. Revised scores: Joy: 1, Sadness: 1, Anger: 1, Fear: 1, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 1.
